name: AHMED M ABDULLAHI
objective: To leverage data engineering, automation, and scalable software development skills to drive impact in tech-forward environments.

education.school: University of Louisville, J.B. Speed School of Engineering

Projects.title: Rocket Launch Delay Prediction (Space Force)
Projects.description: Built and deployed a machine learning model on AWS EC2 using AutoML (H2O) and Python to predict rocket launch delays. Boosted model accuracy by 50% using real-time weather API data and automated ETL/retraining pipelines. Visualized performance metrics with Matplotlib and Seaborn. (linkedin post listed)

Projects.title: AI NP-Complete Problems: A Deep Dive into the Chinese Postman Problem
Projects.description: Implemented a novel approach combining Genetic Algorithms (GA) and Wisdom of Crowds (WoC) to solve the Chinese Postman Problem, an NP-complete problem. This project involved developing and testing a hybrid GA+WoC algorithm in Python, aiming to find the shortest closed path that visits every edge of a graph. The solution has practical applications in route optimization and logistics. Extensive experiments were conducted to ensure the robustness and efficiency of the algorithm, including the development of a GUI for visual representation of algorithmic solutions.

Projects.title: UPS - WTO Refresh - Toad Oracle Project
Projects.description: This project involves the use of Toad for Oracle to develop and refresh complex PL/SQL procedures, functions, and SQL scripts for the World Trade Organization (WTO) database systems. It includes the optimization of existing queries and the implementation of new features to enhance the performance and reliability of the WTO data processing and reporting tasks.

Projects.title: Interactive Health Data Visualization
Projects.description: Created an interactive interface for exploring and analyzing digital health data, extracting valuable insights through visualizations.

Projects.title: Meal Rater App
Projects.description: An Android application developed in Java, using SQL for database interactions. It allows users to rate meals from different restaurants. The main features include adding restaurant and dish names, rating them, and viewing aggregated ratings.

Projects.title: Tic Tac Toe Game
Projects.description: Developed a simple 3D connect tic-tac-toe game with a state using C programming.

Projects.title: My Portfolio Site
Projects.description: Responsive React portfolio showcasing skills, projects, and experiences effectively.

Projects.title: light switch
Projects.description: Utilized object-oriented programming and JavaFX to create a compact simulation that changes colors with the click of a button. Implemented smooth animations and interactive functionality.

Projects.title: GPA Calculator
Projects.description: Graphical interface for a grade calculator that gives you your weighted grade.
